DOC.brief_title: Assessment Of Vitamin D Role In The Pathogenesis Of Asthma In Vitamin D Resistent Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Research Title : Evaluation airway reactivity , allergy inflammatory mediator exhale breath condensate vitamin D resistant rickets . Introduction : Vitamin D seem play role allergic asthmatic reaction . Vitamin D resistant rickets patient lack vitamin D receptor absorb vitamin D. Aim : To assess effect absence vitamin D receptor airway reactivity , allergy inflammatory mediator exhale breath condensate . Design : Prospective study evaluate parameter patient vitamin D resistant rickets healthy control . Participant selection : The study group consist vitamin D resistant rickets patient follow treated Pediatric Endocrinology Department hospital . The study group compare age- sex-matched healthy control group negative methacholine challenge test . Sample size : 40 participant two group . Intervention : Each subject undergo evaluation include respiratory questionnaire , pulmonary function test , methacholine challenge test determination PC20 , exhale nitric oxide ( eNO ) , exhale breath condensate ( EBC ) . Venous blood analyze complete blood count + eosinophils , IGE level , Vitamin D level . Prick skin test inhale allergen perform . All measurement evaluate single 3 hour visit , follow study visit . Primary end point : Airway reactivity assess methacholine challenge test . Secondary outcome parameter : All parameter secondary end point .
